English.Text: Few have any experience of caving. The route they take is clammy and claustrophobic, and seems to be leading nowhere, when there is a sudden and awful screeching of bats! A man loses his footing and falls through a gapâ€” he has broken a leg. His rescue is especially tiresome. It takes several hours in the confined space, which he fills with his moans whenever anyone so much as touches the injured leg. You are forced to abandon your search for El Doodah.
